live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage their is No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
60158.summary: Some customers in Scotch Creek are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60158.title: Apr 14 - Scotch Creek | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
